channel.title: Error can't load or find main class client
channel.description:
I'm using PI as a source, I'm trying to create a .jar file for my client and when I try to run it after I create the file, this error shows up. Error: Could not find or load main class client
I've tried everything I know and I need some help from others, please help asap

item.title: Error can't load or find main class client
item.dc:creator: @Project_Territh Project Territh
item.description:

I’m using PI as a source, I’m trying to create a .jar file for my client and when I try to run it after I create the file, this error shows up.

I’ve tried everything I know and I need some help from others, please help asap
